description: Settings used to build a new PHAR using Box.

algorithm.description: The algorithm to use for signing the PHAR.

alias.description: The internal PHAR alias used for I/O streams.

ignore.description: A list of annotation names to ignore.

banner.description: The header comment for the generated stub.

banner-file.description: The header comment file for the generated stub.

base-path.description: The base path where relative paths are resolved to.

blacklist.description: A list of file paths to skip.

bootstrap.description: A file used to load third-party class compactors.

check-requirements.description: If enabled, the PHAR will be able to check if the PHP environment used meets all the requirements to run the application.

chmod.description: The permission mode for the new PHAR.

compactors.description: The list of file contents compactor classes to register.

compression.description: The compression algorithm to use for the PHAR.

datetime.description: The replacement date for the current date and time.

datetime_format.description: The format for the current date and time.

directories.description: A list of directory paths to search for scripts.

directories-bin.description: A list of directory paths to search for binary safe files.

files.description: A list of file paths to include.

files-bin.description: A list of binary safe file paths to include.

finder.description: A list of Finder configuration settings.

finder-bin.description: A list of Finder configuration settings for binary safe files.

git-commit.description: The replacement name for the current Git full commit hash.

git-commit-short.description: The replacement name for the current Git short commit hash.

git-tag.description: The replacement name for the current Git tag.

git-version.description: The replacement name for the current Git tag or commit hash.

import.description: The path to a Box configuration file for importing.

intercept.description: Allow the PHAR to intercept file functions?

key.description: The path to the private key used for signing.

key-pass.description: The password or prompt flag used for the private key.

main.description: The file path to the main script.

map.description: The mapping of file system paths to phar paths.

output.description: The file name or path of the new PHAR.

php-scoper.description: Path to the PHP-Scoper configuration file.

replacement-sigil.description: The sigil that surrounds the replacement names.

replacements.description: A list of replacement names and their values.

shebang.description: The shebang line to use for the generated stub.

stub.description: The relative file path to the stub file, or the flag to use the default stub.
